citation.abstract: The aim of this study was to examine neurodevelopment, psychological adjustment, and health-related quality of life (HRQoL) in adolescents after bypass surgery for congenital heart disease (CHD) during early childhood.
citation.title: Neurodevelopmental outcome, psychological adjustment, and quality of life in adolescents with congenital heart disease
